Metadata.Title: RHSA-2024:0213: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 (python-eventlet) security update (Moderate)

Platforms: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 for RHEL 9

Metadata.Description:
Eventlet is a networking library written in Python. It achieves high
scalability by using non-blocking io while at the same time retaining high
programmer usability by using coroutines to make the non-blocking io
operations appear blocking at the source code
level.

Security Fix(es):

* patch regression for CVE-2021-21419 in some Red Hat builds
(CVE-2023-5625)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

Criterions.Comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-eventlet is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
